Chance!"},{"lineNumber":143197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、どうする！？　燃やし殺すか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, what do we do!? Burn her to death!?\""},{"lineNumber":143198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、殺すな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, don’t kill her!"},{"lineNumber":143199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　持って帰って犯さねーとよぉ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We gotta take her back and have our way with her first!\""},{"lineNumber":143200,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵は好機と見るや、","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster soldiers saw an opportunity,"},{"lineNumber":143201,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐさま謙信を取り囲んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and immediately surrounded Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":143202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph!\""},{"lineNumber":143203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げぶっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geh!?"},{"lineNumber":143204,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後の力を振り絞り放った刀の一閃が魔物兵を断つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A flash of his blade, wielded with his last strength, cut through the monster soldiers."},{"lineNumber":143205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゅーッ！　なんて奴だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoaa! What a guy!"},{"lineNumber":143206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だがもう限界だろう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"But he’s gotta be at his limit now!\""},{"lineNumber":143207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":143208,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵の言葉通り、謙信の体から力が抜ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as the monster soldier said, strength drained from Kenshin’s body."},{"lineNumber":143209,"originalJapaneseLine":"刀を支えにしながらも、謙信はその場に膝をついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Using his sword to support himself, Kenshin dropped to his knees on the spot."},{"lineNumber":143210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くくく、ここまでのようだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh heh, it looks like this is the end...\""},{"lineNumber":143211,"originalJapaneseLine":"安全なことを確認してから、","translatedEnglishLine":"After confirming it was safe,"},{"lineNumber":143212,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に魔物将軍が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the monster general appeared there."},{"lineNumber":143213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様、貴様が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You, you are...\""},{"lineNumber":143214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふふ、残念だったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufufu, what a pity."},{"lineNumber":143215,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将の首を取るまでもう少しだったのになぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We were so close to taking the general’s head.\""},{"lineNumber":143216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様は私が直々に犯してやろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As for you, I will personally violate you."},{"lineNumber":143217,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、誰かその女を捕らえろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, someone capture that woman!\""},{"lineNumber":143218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケケケケッ！　俺、こういう女だぁい好き！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kekekeke! I love women like these!\""},{"lineNumber":143219,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵の巨大な手が謙信に伸びる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The huge hand of the monster soldier reached out toward Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":143220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスあたたたたーーーっく！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, attttttack!\""},{"lineNumber":143221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐあああああああっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guaaaaaaaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":143222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラ、ンス、殿……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"R-Rance, my lord...\""},{"lineNumber":143223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この馬鹿者、無茶をしおって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You fool, you went too far.\""},{"lineNumber":143224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch...\""},{"lineNumber":143225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こら、逃げるな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, come back, don’t run off!\""},{"lineNumber":143226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、お前ら！　俺を守れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you guys! Protect me!\""},{"lineNumber":143227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここから先には通さんぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't let you pass this point!\""},{"lineNumber":143228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ、ここまでだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, this is as far as we go.\""},{"lineNumber":143229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ai!\""},{"lineNumber":143230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かってます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood!\""},{"lineNumber":143231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これより我が軍は撤退する！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on, our army will retreat!"},{"lineNumber":143232,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怪我人を優先的に連れていき、","translatedEnglishLine":"Priority goes to taking the injured with us,"},{"lineNumber":143233,"originalJapaneseLine":"　先程伝えた通りのルートを！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and follow the route I told you earlier!\""},{"lineNumber":143234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、謙信様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, Lord Kenshin...\""},{"lineNumber":143235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ai...\""},{"lineNumber":143236,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛が謙信に肩を貸す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai lent her shoulder to Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":143237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とっととトンズラだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's get the hell out of here!"},{"lineNumber":143238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go!\""},{"lineNumber":143239,"originalJapaneseLine":"上杉軍陣地――","translatedEnglishLine":"Uesugi Army Camp—"},{"lineNumber":143240,"originalJapaneseLine":"テント内――","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the tent—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな状況じゃ、何が起こるか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In a situation like this, who knows what could happen...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 孤軍奮闘、たった一人で戦い続けた謙信が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, fighting desperately alone against all odds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、どうする！？　燃やし殺すか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what do we do!? Burn her to death!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持って帰って犯さねーとよぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We gotta take her back and have our way with her first!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は好機と見るや、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldiers saw an opportunity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐさま謙信を取り囲んだ。
最後の力を振り絞り放った刀の一閃が魔物兵を断つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flash of his blade, wielded with his last strength, cut through the monster soldiers.
But he’s gotta be at his limit now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の言葉通り、謙信の体から力が抜ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as the monster soldier said, strength drained from Kenshin’s body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀を支えにしながらも、謙信はその場に膝をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using his sword to support himself, Kenshin dropped to his knees on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくく、ここまでのようだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh heh, it looks like this is the end..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全なことを確認してから、
その場に魔物将軍が現れた。
将の首を取るまでもう少しだったのになぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were so close to taking the general’s head."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様は私が直々に犯してやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for you, I will personally violate you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、誰かその女を捕らえろ」
「ケケケケッ！　俺、こういう女だぁい好き！」
魔物兵の巨大な手が謙信に伸びる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The huge hand of the monster soldier reached out toward Kenshin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスあたたたたーーーっく！」
「この馬鹿者、無茶をしおって」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won't let you pass this point!"
"Damn, this is as far as we go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これより我が軍は撤退する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, our army will retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我人を優先的に連れていき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Priority goes to taking the injured with us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先程伝えた通りのルートを！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and follow the route I told you earlier!"
Ai lent her shoulder to Kenshin.
"Let's get the hell out of here!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
